text:
It would be helpful to have a link to the KEYS file on the Batik download page,
for example as is done here:

http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi
or
http://jakarta.apache.org/site/downloads/downloads_cactus.cgi
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
Added link to the "Verify" section of the installation notes, and an explicit link to the keys file.

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=634128
creator: cam@apache.org

text:
The KEYS link does not seem to be present on the web-site.

Has the updated page been deployed?
creator: sebb@apache.org
cam@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> Has the updated page been deployed?

No, because I forgot. :)  It has now, so take a look in an hour or so and it should be there.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: OK, thanks. I can see the pages now (using the proxy 140.211.11.10 trick).
